remarks: An alternative expression for the set of polynomials, as the smallest subalgebra of the set of power series that contains all the variable generators.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

opsrle.d $e |- D = { h e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' h " NN ) e. Fin } $.
opsrle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` O ) $.
opsrle.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrle $p |- ( ph -> .<_ = { <. x , y >. | ( { x , y } C_ B /\ ( E. z e. D ( ( x ` z ) .< ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. D ( w C z -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) \/ x = y ) ) } ) $.

$d T w x y z $.
